title: 101 Ways to Die in a Hostel
subtitle: Ghost Possession
series: 101 Ways to Die in a Hostel
tagline: Some hostels are a bargain. Others cost you your life.

synopsis.short: A skeptical paranormal debunker invites a Victorian-era ghost to possess her body as a joke during a seance, only to discover the spirit has no intention of leaving and systematically shuts down her organs from within.

death_teaser: She opened the door. It walked right in.
